fill_in_the_blank_instructions.description: The instruction text for students for this step
fill_in_the_blank_instructions.value: املأ كل فراغ بالكلمة / الكلمات الصحيحة.

help.description: The text 'help' to show on the help button

correct.description: The word 'Correct' to display when student fills in the right answer.

incorrect.description: The word 'Incorrect' to display in the gradingtool next to incorrect student answers.

answer_for_blank.description: Text indicating which blank the student is currently on

all_correct_msg.description: The message to display when student fills in all the right answers.
all_correct_msg.value:
لقد ملأت جميع الفراغات بنجاح.
عمل مذهل!

not_correct_msg.description: The message to display when student fills in an incorrect answer.
not_correct_msg.value: غير صحيح أو به خطأ إملائي

successfully_filled_in_part1.description: 'You successfully filled' part of 'You successfully filled x blanks in y tries'

successfully_filled_in_one_blank_in.description: '1 blank in' part of 'You successfully filled x blanks in y tries'

successfully_filled_in_x_blanks_in.description: 'x blanks in' part of 'You successfully filled x blanks in y tries'

successfully_filled_in_one_try.description: '1 try' part of 'You successfully filled x blanks in y tries'

successfully_filled_in_y_tries.description: 'y tries' part of 'You successfully filled x blanks in y tries'
